channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report E-2023110103
item.description:
Report E-2023110103

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNIVAR SOLUTIONS USA INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During container loading into a 3rd party trailer, a drum was punctured by a protruding nail head on the pallet. The leak was immediately noticed and pallet was removed from trailer. Leaking drum was placed on a secondary containment at the dock. Product loss was less than 2 gallons, predominately into the containment. Absorbent was immediately placed on the spilled material and recovered.

item.title: Report X-2023101457
item.description:
Report X-2023101457

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-21
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL TO THE UNLOAD WALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL IDENTIFIED SAID PACKAGE, DONNED PPE, AND PLACED PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMP AREA. RESPONDER TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL
